scripts.build: rm -rf docs && rm -rf dist && rollup -c && yarn docs
scripts.git-push: f() { param=${1}; message=${param:-chore}; echo ${message}; git add .; echo $message | git commit -F -; yarn publish --patch --no-git-tag-version; version="v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")"; git add .; echo $version | git commit -F -; git push origin main; echo $version | git tag -a $(echo $version) -F -; git push origin --tags; }; f
scripts.push: f() { yarn build; yarn git-push "${1}"; }; f
